name: ControlMyBath
0:
”Alexa, bath light on”
”Alexa, drain on”
”Alexa, bath jets on”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can turn on and off the following items on your tub - water jets, air jets, lights; Microbubbles and drain pump by giving orders to Alexa.

Download the Control My Bath App from the Apple Store or the Google Play Store Installed Control My Bath app and create an account. Download Control My Bath skill on Alexa Follow the prompts to log into Control My Bath to link to Alexa
